name: Strength Sap
effect: Reduce Foe's Strength. User Heals HP equal to the Foe's current Strength (taking into account the target's base stat and Stat Changes, including the reduction from Strength Sap). If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate.
description: The Pokemon looks for a weak spot on its foe, then feeds on its vital energy. The foe is left feeling feeble.
